content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
--------------------
No structures have been successfully created on the map. Multiple recovery updates targeted the Lab at (0.5, 2.5), but all attempts to craft or place it failed. There are no other agent–placed constructions reported.

ERROR TIPS
----------
• API usage errors with get_entities():
 – Do not supply unsupported keyword arguments (e.g., 'radius') and verify the correct function signature to avoid passing unexpected positional arguments.
• Lab placement failures:
 – Ensure that a Lab is available in the inventory before attempting to place one.
• Iteration over None:
 – Check that functions returning collections (such as get_entities) do not yield None before iterating over them.
• Lab crafting resource shortages:
 – Confirm that all required sub–ingredients (e.g., iron‐gear–wheels and electronic circuits) are available. Pre–smelt or pre–craft necessary components to meet recipe requirements before retrying Lab assembly.
